text: Brain Rot was satire until it sounded like a medical report on my attention span.
drafts: Brain Rot was satire until it sounded like a medical report on my attention span.||Older song, current mood: Brain Rot.||I wrote this as a joke and accidentally told the truth.

text: Too many tabs. One nervous system. #BrainRot
drafts: Too many tabs. One nervous system. #BrainRot||Time is fake, notifications are real.||Brain Rot in 20 seconds.

imagery: 3-panel carousel: doomscroll hand / cracked smile / dark room
text: Some songs are clocks. Brain Rot is an alarm.
drafts: Some songs are clocks. Brain Rot is an alarm.||You can laugh and panic in the same chorus.||Older song. New weather.

text: If you can’t read clocks, maybe time is just a myth.
drafts: If you can’t read clocks, maybe time is just a myth.||Clocks measure numbers, not grief.||New transmission, same old ache.

text: Late again. Right on emotional schedule.
